entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
